Uses of Class
org.apache.taverna.workflowmodel.processor.config.ConfigurationBean

  • Packages that use ConfigurationBean 
    Package Description
    org.apache.taverna.activities.stringconstant
    Contains the activity classes required in the execution of Beanshell scripts.
    org.apache.taverna.workflowmodel.processor.activity.config
    A set of helper classes to aid in defining how Activities are configured.
    org.apache.taverna.workflowmodel.processor.dispatch.layers
    Contains implementations of DispatchLayer defined by the core Taverna 2 specification.

    • Uses of ConfigurationBean in org.apache.taverna.activities.stringconstant

      Classes in org.apache.taverna.activities.stringconstant with annotations of type ConfigurationBean 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  StringConstantConfigurationBean
      Configuration bean for setting up a StringConstantActivity.
      The only thing to be configured is the string value, since the ports are fixed.

    • Uses of ConfigurationBean in org.apache.taverna.workflowmodel.processor.activity.config

      Classes in org.apache.taverna.workflowmodel.processor.activity.config with annotations of type ConfigurationBean 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ActivityInputPortDefinitionBean
      A bean that describes properties of an Input port.
      class  ActivityOutputPortDefinitionBean
      A bean that describes properties of an Output port.
      class  ActivityPortDefinitionBean
      A generic bean that describes the shared properties of input and output ports.
      class  ActivityPortsDefinitionBean
      Defines a configuration type that relates directly to an Activity and in particular defines details its input and output ports.
      An Activity that has its ports implicitly defined may define a ConfigType that extends this class, but this is not enforced.

    • Uses of ConfigurationBean in org.apache.taverna.workflowmodel.processor.dispatch.layers

      Classes in org.apache.taverna.workflowmodel.processor.dispatch.layers with annotations of type ConfigurationBean 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  LoopConfiguration
      Configuration bean for the Loop.
      class  ParallelizeConfig
      Bean to hold the configuration for the parallelize layer, specifically a single int property defining the number of concurrent jobs in that processor instance per owning process ID.
      class  RetryConfig
